entities.name: hagrides
entities.description: The narrator who is desperately injured and has found a Horcrux.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who created the Horcruxes.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic where the narrator is injured.

entities.name: gaunts house
entities.description: The place where the Horcrux was hidden by Voldemort.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison for wizards and witches where Morfin Gaunt is being held.

relationships.description: The narrator was injured at Hogwarts.
Voldemort hid a Horcrux in the Gaunt's house.
The narrator found the Horcrux at the Gaunt's house.
Voldemort sent his family member Morfin to Azkaban.
